attributes.action: Stop European migrants  being able to Vote in  any "British referendums" concerning European Treaties or Constitutional reforms or changes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reason being, is that I believe the Mass-immigration being forced upon us is to dilute our Democracy on any European matters that we "might" be allowed to have a referendum on in the future.
Migrants should only be allowed to vote in their "Mother countries" referendums so as to not upset the Democratic balance in the UK.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
